title: The Kathmandu - 700 E
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Nepali, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers 30+ vegan dishes, including soups and rice. Lunch buffet served Mon-Sat til 2:30pm. Ingredients are listed on the menu and on the buffet items and plenty are vegan suitable. Peaceful atmosphere with Wi-Fi.
